analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Naaraṇaṁ naāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na araṇam na āsavam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naaraṇaṁ nasaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na araṇam na saññojanam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ saññojanaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Naaraṇaṁ naganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na araṇam na gantham dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ ganthaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naaraṇaṁ naoghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na araṇam na ogham dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ oghaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naaraṇaṁ noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na araṇam no yogam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ yogaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naaraṇaṁ nanīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na araṇam na nīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ nīvaraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naaraṇaṁ naparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na araṇam na parāmāsam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ parāmāsaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
